data.title: A Zero-Shot Approach to Upsampling Single Channel Speech Separation Using a Diffusion Model (2023)
data.longDescription: The study demonstrates the effectiveness of integrating a diffusion upscaling model for post-processing, showcasing the potential for practical applications in real-time audio separation in production environments.

data.title: PH Tech News Digest
data.shortDescription: Aggregation of tech news sources in the Philippines
data.longDescription: Provides an updated single location to check science, technology, and business related news from Philippines news sources. Automatically updates its database of articles and provides its users with the ability to filter the news in the news feed.

data.title: Tictactoe
data.shortDescription: Tictactoe but you place over each other's pieces
data.longDescription: Developed in Golang and deployed on AWS, the application offers a two player experience concurrently across multiple rooms. The real-time feature enables players to observe live moves as participants drag their pieces during gameplay, facilitated through WebSocket technology.

data.title: Gentoo
data.shortDescription: Twitter clone with hate speech classification
data.longDescription: A twitter clone integrated with an internally developed BERT hate speech classifier. Employs multi-task text classification to assess hatefulness and targeted communities. Enables administrators to moderate the platform using our developed AI model.

data.title: Textra
data.longDescription: A desktop application that enables users to message and search for other users, bookmark conversations, and create groups. Implements administrative features such as registration requests and banning of users.

data.title: Graph algorithms visualizer
data.shortDescription: Dijkstra's path finding, Depth-First Search, Breadth-First Search
data.longDescription: Visualizes a graph in a radial manner given the graphâ€™s edges and weights. Highlights the edges an algorithm visits while it is running.

data.title: Volunteer management system
data.shortDescription: CRUD application to manage events and volunteers
data.longDescription: An application that enables event managers to create and manage events that volunteers want to take part in.

data.title: Huffman tree visualizer
data.shortDescription: Visualize the step by step process of the huffman compression algorithm

data.title: Events management system
data.shortDescription: CRUD application to manage your events
data.longDescription: Events management system with PHP and Express backend integrated with a MySQL database.

data.title: Anagram Guessing Game
data.shortDescription: Guess the word given a random sequence of letters
data.longDescription: This game was created in compliance with the Common Object Request Broker Architecture (CORBA), enabling a python client to directly communicate with a java server.

data.title: Me
data.shortDescription: My personalized footprint on the internet
data.longDescription: My personalized mark footprint the internet serving as a self-documentation of my career, showcase for my projects, and where I express my thoughts and insights from my professional endeavors.

data.title: Scribe
data.shortDescription: Generate slides and transcription from a lecture video
data.longDescription: A project that is very much still a work in progress.

data.title: Roots calculator
data.shortDescription: Approximate the roots of an equation using bracketing methods
data.longDescription:
Bracketing methods you can use: Bisection, False Position, Newton Rhapson, Secant, Simple Fixed Point Iteration, Non-Linear.
 Built with Flask hosted on Heroku

data.title: Vaccination Dashboard
data.longDescription: Created back when I was still studying vanila JS and CSS.

data.title: Calculator
data.longDescription: First project that I was proud of :D Implemented the shunting yard algorithm for this calculator. Made this in my first year of taking computer science degree.
